name: Justice of Tyr - The Wizard Trials
name_original: Justice of Tyr - The Wizard Trials
description:
Useful Info 

- touching a gem will allow you to use any ability again but only as long as it is bright blue and you are touching it.

- Tutorial Below

- Assets in the cave from the tutorial are different because they were placeholders        made by someone else i remade them in the actual game.

- Assets made in Aseprite 

- Sounds made in - https://www.bfxr.net/

Controls 

A - Left

D - Right

Space - Jump

Left Arrow - Double Jump/Tornado

Up Arrow - Fire Dash

Tutorial in case people want to rage quit or think the game is impossible
